Package de.ikor.sip.foundation.security.authentication.basic

    Token extractor for getting username and password from the Basic Authentication header.
    Author:
    thomas.stieglmaier

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        public SIPBasicAuthAuthenticationToken extract​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Description copied from interface: SIPTokenExtractor
        Extracts a token of the given type from a request. Implementations of this method should throw BadCredentialsException in case necessary token was not found, or had an invalid format, for proper mapping of the response status code (401 Unauthorized). Other exceptions will be mapped to internal server error.
        Specified by:
        extract in interface SIPTokenExtractor<SIPBasicAuthAuthenticationToken>
        Parameters:
        request - the request the token should be extracted from
        Returns:
        the extracted token

        The type of the token to be extracted
